h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: This will lead to the bottom of a giant frozen waterfall, and guarding it is a strange type of Abomination enemy. This foe sports two tentacle-like appendages growing over his shoulder that he can use to attack with, alternating lashes with both sides before bringing them both upward.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
This will lead to the bottom of a giant frozen waterfall, and guarding it is a strange type of Abomination enemy. This foe sports two tentacle-like appendages growing over his shoulder that he can use to attack with, alternating lashes with both sides before bringing them both upward.
